english.segment1: I know He rescued my soul. His blood covered my sin. I believe, I believe
english.segment2: My shame He's taken away. My pain is healed in His name. I believe, I believe
english.prechorus: I'll raise a banner. 'Cause my Lord has conquered the grave.
english.chorus: My Redeemer lives my Redeemer lives. My Redeemer lives my Redeemer lives. My Redeemer lives my Redeemer lives. My Redeemer lives my Redeemer lives.
english.segment4: You lift my burdens. And I rise with You. I'm dancing on this mountain top. To see Your Kingdom come.
